mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME ,S.SEAT_NUMBER FROM RESERVE AS R INNER JOIN MEMBER AS M ON R.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN ROUTE AS RO ON R.ROUTE_ID = RO.ROUTE_ID INNER JOIN SEAT AS S ON S.RESERVE_ID = R.RESERVE_ID WHERE R.DEPARTURE_DATE = #{date} AND RO.ROUTE_ID = #{searchRouteId} ORDER BY S.SEAT_NUMBER ;

SELECT R.RESERVED_DATE ,R.ROUTE_ID ,RO.DEPARTURE_ID ,RO.ARRIVAL_ID ,RO.PRICE ,RO.BUS_ID ,BS.BUS_STATION_NAME AS DEPARTURE_NAME ,BS1.BUS_STATION_NAME AS ARRIVAL_NAME ,R.DEPARTURE_DATE ,R.RESERVE_ID
FROM RESERVE AS R INNER JOIN MEMBER AS M ON R.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN ROUTE AS RO ON R.ROUTE_ID = RO.ROUTE_ID INNER JOIN BUS_STATION AS BS ON BS.BUS_STATION_ID = RO.DEPARTURE_ID INNER JOIN BUS_STATION AS BS1 ON BS1.BUS_STATION_ID = RO.ARRIVAL_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId};
